description: This file defines a React component called NotesPage that manages the display of notes. It renders either a NoteEditor for a specific note identified via routing or an EmptyState component prompting note creation. It uses hooks and external components to facilitate editing and navigation.

methods.name: NotesPage({ route, navigate, notesApi })
methods.description: React functional component that displays and manages notes based on route parameters and notes API interactions.

ctags.name: NotesPage
ctags.pattern: /^export default function NotesPage({ route, navigate, notesApi }) {$/
